item.description:
Join Tina to try out "The Naked Oyster" restaurant downtown.Â  To help find her, she plans to sit near the Right of the Door, and most likely will be wearing a Green Dress.

For those who love oysters or Martin's or Drinks.

The Naked Oyster has a Happy Hour daily from 4PM-7PM with $1 Oysters and $6 Martini's

We could do this on a Saturday? I called and checked they Happy a Happy Hour on Saturdays as well.

They serve than just more oyster. Would love to get a group together to go eat there. They have a Vodka bar with over 100 Vodkas too.

They have Soups/ Salads/ Chicken Dishes / Steak/ Burgers etc. It's more of a French Louisiana Cuisine but I would love to try their Oysters and Oyster Shooters. Can't go wrong with Dollar Oysters.

There is plenty of Parking in the Area and Street Parking.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Tina, as described in the event post.
item.name: Dinner/Happy Hour at The Naked Oyster ($1 Oysters)
